Sentencas: Perovskites with fast oxygen ion conduction can enable technologies like solid oxide fuel cells.
Titulo: Factors controlling oxygen migration barriers in perovskites

Sentencas: One component of fast oxygen ion conduction is low oxygen migration barrier.
Titulo: Factors controlling oxygen migration barriers in perovskites

Sentencas: Here we apply ab initio methods on over 40 perovskites to produce a database of oxygen migration barriers ranging from 0.2 to 1.6 eV. Mining the database revealed that systems with low barriers also have low metal-oxygen bond strength, as measured by oxygen vacancy formation energy and oxygen p-band center energy.
Titulo: Factors controlling oxygen migration barriers in perovskites

Sentencas: These correlations provide a powerful descriptor for the development of new oxygen ion conductors and may explain the poor stability of some of the best oxygen conducting perovskites under reducing conditions.
Titulo: Factors controlling oxygen migration barriers in perovskites

Sentencas: Other commonly-cited measures of space, volume, or structure ideality showed only weak correlation with migration barrier.
Titulo: Factors controlling oxygen migration barriers in perovskites

Sentencas: The lowest migration barriers (<0.5 eV) belong to perovskites with non-transition-metal B-site cations, and may require vacancy-creation strategies that involve no dopants or low-association dopants for optimal performance.
Titulo: Factors controlling oxygen migration barriers in perovskites
